name: Minecraft on Kubernetes Server Manager
description: Management tool for hosting Minecraft servers on Kubernetes.

name: ChatGPT Memory Plugin
description: ChatGPT plugin utilizing FastAPI. Uses the ChatGPT API to extract context from text, persisting it for retrieval from a vector database.

name: ML Food Dispenser
description: Deep learning project involving training a convolutional neural network object dectector.

name: MangaDex Bot
description: Discord bot for interacting with the MangaDex API, with an alert feature when your following list is updated.

name: Dubercore
description: ICS4UE - AP Computer Science summative project. 2D arcade game with procedural generation and destructible terrain. Inspired by Deep Rock Galactic.

name: Sneak 100
description: ICS3UE - Pre-AP Computer Science summative project. Top down stealth game. Inspired by Monaco: What's Yours Is Mine.

name: Dank Souls IV
description: ICS2OG - Gr. 10 Computer Science summative project. 2D fighting game.
